dialogue.dialogueText: “Boy you should keep your unhealthy desires to yourself.”

dialogue.name: Watanabe-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “I can see where your eyes are looking boy! Your eyes are drifting all over Shimizu-sensei’s body, checking out her boobs and her butt. You boys are all alike!”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Mr. Watanabe stared at me with widened eyes and a heavy blush.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Okay so I am pretty sure this guy is projecting...A creepy perverted teacher? How delightful.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “With all due respect Sensei my eyes are not doing that!”

dialogue.name: Shimizu-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “With all due respect Mr. Watanabe I do not believe his eyes were focused on my...body. Maybe you shouldn’t project your thoughts onto the students.”

dialogue.name: Shimizu-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “Now Takeshi-Kun please follow me, I will take you to your homeroom.”
